item.title: Nikon D800
item.description:
Php 149,000.00
Checkout with Multiply: 
http://widgetcity.multiply.com/
Yes
Specifications

36 MP sensor (7360x4912)
100% viewfinder coverage
Improved AF with face recognition – the D800 will still have 51 points AF point
CF+SD memory card slots
USB 3.0
ISO range: 100 – 6400, ISO LO @ 50 and ISO HI-2 @ 25600
The screen will be larger than 3 inches (probably 3.2 in.)
The D800 will not have built-in GPS
Expeed 3 processor
There will be two different D800 versions/models, one with the antialiasing filter removed
4 fps continuous shooting, about 6 fps in DX mode with optional battery pack
Video modes: 1080p/30/25/24 and 720p/60/30/25/24
Headphone jack, can input from an external device such as a PCM sound recorder
86k pixels RGB sensor
200,000 shutter cycles
Uncompressed HDMI video out (just like the Nikon D4)

Read more on NikonRumors.com: http://nikonrumors.com/2011/12/16/updated-nikon-d800-specs.aspx/#ixzz1z7...

Php 149,000.00

approx. 2 EV above ISO 3200 (ISO 12800 equivalent); auto ISO sensitivity control available

item.description:

  • Storage media:SD / SDHC / SDXC
  • Monitor:3-in.approx.921k-dot (VGA),vari-angle low-temperature polysilicon TFT LCD with 170�viewing angle,approx. 100% frame coverage,and brightness adjustment
  • Exposure metering:TTL exposure metering using 420-pixel RGB sensor
  • Exposure modes:Matrix: 3D color matrix metering II (type G and D lenses); color matrix metering II (other CPU lenses),Center-weighted: Weight of 75% given to 8-mm circle in center of frame,Spot: Meters 3.5-mm circle (about 2.5% of frame) centered on selected focus point
  • Dimensions:128 x 97 x 79 mm
  • Weight:560G with battery and memory card but without body cap

Php 21,800.00

 The Nikon D5100 camera captures 1080p full HD movies with full-time auto focus and manual exposure control. Nikon D5100 users can quickly switch focus modes to stay with the action through a variety of AF functions, including face priority which can track up to 35 human faces, subject tracking and normal or wide area auto focus.

item.title: Sony NEX 5K 18-55 Kit
item.description:
Php 27,100.00
Yes
Specification

Sony Alpha NEX-5K 14.2MP DSLR Camera:
14.2 megapixel resolution
Delivers excellent picture quality
Carl Zeiss 18-55mm zoom lens
Offers f/22 to f/2.8 aperture
3.0" TFT TruBlack LCD display
Enjoy easy focus selection and photo viewing on this tiltable LCD
HD video
Record movies in HD format at up to 1020/30p
8 scene modes
Compose a variety of shots
BRAVIA sync
Via HDMI port with compatible BRAVIA HDTV
Multi-format memory slot
Compatible with Memory Stick Pro Duo/Pro-HG Duo/Pro-HG HX Duo and SD/SDHC/SDXC memory cards

Package

1 Sony NEX-5K DSLR Camera
1 NP-FW50 Lithium ion rechargeable battery
1 BC-VW1 Battery Charger
1 Power cord
1 USB cable (Mini B)
1 Shoulder strap
1 CD-ROM
1 User's Guide

Php 27,100.00

The Sony Alpha NEX-5K 14.2MP DSLR Camera has the performance of a DSLR, in about half the size and weight. The NEX-5 is the interchangeable lens camera that goes wherever you do. Enjoy Full HD 1020/30p movies, astounding low-light pictures, continuous shooting up to 7fps, incredible panorama shots, and Live View on a tilting 3.0" LCD. Note: Memory card not included. The purchase of a memory card is highly recommended.
